pr_title: Fix backup worker crashing master on interruption

timeline.message: Fix backup worker crashing master on interruption

timeline.bodyText: @bf8086 Can you provide a timeline for the double resume case?
timeline.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Basically the backup starts and suspends the journal, then the journal resumes, interrupts the backup and reloads from the snapshot, and then the backup attempts to resume the journal again and hit this issue.
replies.author: bf8086
